title: ICE when executing `rustc --print crate-name`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Could not find another report for this ICE ### Reproduction ``` rustc --print crate-name ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.69.0-nightly (ef934d9b6 2023-02-08) binary: rustc commit-hash: ef934d9b632b8ac00276558824664c104b92b5f0 commit-date: 2023-02-08 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.69.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', compiler/rustc_driver_impl/src/lib.rs:631:44 ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f8d95d6a56a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h333e160faf33c040 at /rustc/ef934d9b632b8ac00276558824664c104b92b5f0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x7f8d95d6a56a - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::h8be2d45828eda716 at /rustc/ef934d9b632b8ac00276558824664c104b92b5f0/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x7f8d95d6a56a - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h5f01de6047fb3c77 at /rustc/ef934d9b632b8ac00276558824664c104b92b5f0/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x7f8d95d6a56a - 28: 0x7f8d95b89d90 - 29: 0x0 - error: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.69.0-nightly (ef934d9b6 2023-02-08) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu query stack during panic: end of query stack ```
